This is the supplementary material for a submitted paper titled:
"Seismoacoustic monitoring of a longwall face using distributed acoustic sensing"
Submitted to BSSA in Nov of 2022 and published in 2023.

See also [this related blog post](https://blogs.cdc.gov/niosh-science-blog/2023/07/07/rockbursts/).

## Waveform plots

A directory of PDF plots for each waveform can be found 
[here](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1mWW-trj2cPd8Xriu_mXqi8z3bzULuM8b?usp=share_link). These show
lead cable channels in blue and microphone channels in orange. The summary of the waveform parametrization
are shown at the top of the figure, along with event id and magnitude.
